divs: Sighting DetailsClose Encounter of the Third Kind, i think that is Bloecher of kind B. it Was happen to my sister too. I see One entity like 1,6 meters of stature (tall) in the room library from my home in the country, it was like 1 meter near about me. i was scared, the entity put his hands up and i dont remenber anymore of that day, i need support for this, i wanna know what happen that day, can you help me please?... Thanx and good work by the way.... maybe i think that i know more in my locked mind, cya and thanx again!
